tool_description: Find random rhymes for a single word.
name: Simple Poet
title: Simple Poet

api_list.name: get rhyme
api_list.description: Finds a rhyme for a given word in the database. If multiple words are a rhyme, one is picked at random.

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description: the word you need a rhyme for

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-poet.p.rapidapi.com/time"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-poet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-poet.p.rapidapi.com/{word}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-poet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
